import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Typography, Button, Box, Grid, Paper} from '@material-ui/core'; import {Rating} from '@material-ui/lab' import { BookingContext } from '../BookingContext'; import { Features } from '../myBooking/propertyView/FeaturesView' interface Props { property: any } export const PropertyView: React.FC = (Props) => { const serverAdr = "http://localhost:4000/"; const {setSelectedPropterty, isActive} = useContext(BookingContext); return (
{Props.property.title} {Props.property.subtext} {Props.property.location} {Props.property.beds_adults}
) }
